reviewText: This is such a gem. It's a crime it isn't available in the US. Be careful in ordering that you can play the UK format, but if you can you won't be disappointed. There are so many superlatives about this movie that you won't care about the clunky parts. And the last scene- genius! I don't want to say too much because I wouldn't want to spoil it, but if you love fashion photography, the male nude and beauty for it's own sake, you'll love it.
It is NOT made for American DVD players.  This was NOTclear on the information presented online.  This was NOT a simple oversight.  It's been proven that I am NOT a moron.
